title: The Legend of Hell House
brief_description: A physicist and his wife, along with a young psychic and the only survivor of a previous visit to the notorious Hell House set out to prove life after death and solve the mystery of the haunted house.

constellations_other.name: The Suspense Constellation
constellations_other.description: An exploration of music in suspense works.

description: A team consisting of a physicist, his wife, a young female psychic and the only survivor of the previous visit are sent to the notorious Hell House to prove/disprove survival after death. Previous visitors have either been killed or gone mad, and it is up to the team to survive a full week in isolation, and solve the mystery of the Hell House.
description_for_label: A team consisting of a physicist, his wife, a young female psychic and the only survivor of the previous visit are sent to the notorious Hell House to prove/disprove survival after death. Previous visitors have either been killed or gone mad, and it is up to the team to survive a full week in isolation, and solve the mystery of the Hell House.
